game.title: The Lost Temple of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a long-abandoned temple deep in the heart of the mystical forest, where an ancient civilization once flourished. The temple is said to contain a powerful artifact that could bring great prosperity to our kingdom. However, the journey is treacherous and many adventurers before you have never returned.
game.reward: 10,000 gold coins, a magical amulet granting +5% intelligence, and a boost in reputation among the kingdom's nobles.

task.objective: Gather information about the temple's location.
task.description: Talk to local villagers and gather rumors about the temple's whereabouts. They might know something that can aid you on your journey.
Be cautious of wild beasts and hostile creatures as you venture into the heart of the forest. The journey is long, so be sure to bring enough provisions and supplies.

task.objective: Retrieve the artifact from the temple.
task.description: Finally, you have reached the lost temple. Overcome any obstacles or challenges that lie within and claim the ancient artifact as your reward.
